title: Adventure Music Pack 1
description: Whether your exploring an ancient tomb or traveling down the Amazon River, Adventure Music Pack 1 will set the mood.
longDescription:
First in the series, Adventure Music Pack 1 includes: 

LISTEN

• Music perfect for exploring an ancient tomb or traveling down the Amazon River.

• Music composed using instruments from the Middle East, South American and traditional orchestration. 

• Main tracks are broken down into sub loops to give the user a broader spectrum of music. 

• Fading music tracks perfect for game trailers and youtube videos. 

• Additional music track versions perfect for game endings or transitions. 


Seamless looping music tracks included:

1. Amazon Nights - Full Loop Version

- 2 additional versions

2. Down River - Full Loop Version

- 2 additional versions

3. Lurking in the Jungle - Full Loop Version

- 5 additional versions

4. The Tomb - Full Loop Version

- 5 additional versions

5. Treasure Hunters - Full Loop Version

- 2 additional versions

6. Pharaohs Curse - Full Loop Version

- 2 additional version

7. Middle East Night - Full Loop Version 

- 3 additional version


Fading music tracks included:

1. Amazon Nights

2. Down River

3. Lurking in the Jungle

4. The Tomb

5. Treasure Hunters

6. Pharaohs Curse

7. Middle East Night 


Addition music track versions included:

1. Amazon Nights -Bumper 1, 2 and 3

2. Down River - Bumper 1, 2 and 3

3. Lurking in the Jungle - Bumper 1 and 2

4. Treasure Hunters - Bumper 1 and 2

- Treasure Hunters - Stinger 1 and 2

5. Middle East Night - Stinger 1

- Middle East Night - Bumper 1
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 49

Number of Audio Cues: 49

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes and Fades

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.
